issue.subject: Cannot add a "class association" to a relation having a "resource" childtype.
issue.description:
I cannot save a linked Metadata (a Contact) in MD edit form if the relation has a class association.
On each load the field is empty. And it seems to not be saved in XML.

journals.notes:
Hi Marc,
Can we talk about that tomorrow ?

Thanks !
Found the source, in V4 we cannot add a "class association" to a relation having a "resource" childtype.
